text:
ny	parent.	
Grieving for the baby who 
has died while caring for 
and celebrating the life of 
the surviving baby brings 
very mixed and complex 
emotions. Often the surviving 
baby is premature and in 
a neonatal unit, causing 
additional concern. For further 
information and support, 
contact Twins Trust (www.
twinstrust.org).	Staff	in	the	
neonatal unit will support you 
through	this	difficult	time.
The loss of your baby
Saying goodbye to your baby
A funeral or some other way of saying goodby
